name: Weeder Match
description:
Cut your lawn in your smartphone with your finger on the screen! Mow grass in the fun!
Move finger across the screen phone and cut the overgrown grass!
Don't stop cut some grass by yourself.

Just do it!!!
- Go through the levels and cut even more grass in the new lawn mower.
- Grass cutting has never been so addictive. Easier and more pleasant experience on the green grass under the pleasant smells of freshly mown grass!
